description.en: event fired after a child grid is created
description.jp: event fired after a child grid is created

description.en: event fired before a child grid is going to be created, allows the developer to override the child grid creation
description.jp: event fired before a child grid is going to be created, allows the developer to override the child grid creation

description.en:
Event which is fired when children have been populated (Load on demand)
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was populated
    use args.id to get the data ID of the row
description.jp:
Event which is fired when children have been populated (Load on demand)
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was populated
    use args.id to get the data ID of the row

description.en:
Event which is fired when children are about to be populated (Load on demand)
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be populated
    use args.id to get the data ID of the row
description.jp:
Event which is fired when children are about to be populated (Load on demand)
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be populated
    use args.id to get the data ID of the row

description.en:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row has been collapsed
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was collapsd
description.jp:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row has been collapsed
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was collapsd

description.en:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be collapsed
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be collapsed
description.jp:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be collapsed
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be collapsed

description.en:
Event which is fired after a hierarchical row has been expanded
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was expanded
description.jp:
Event which is fired after a hierarchical row has been expanded
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was expanded

description.en:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be expanded
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be expanded
description.jp:
Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be expanded
    use args.owner to access the hierarchical grid object
    use args.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be expanded

description.en: The row expanding/collapsing animation duration in ms.
description.jp: The row expanding/collapsing animation duration in ms.

description.en:
if true, will autogenerate all layouts assuming default values for "childrenDataProperty"
    When autoGenerateLayouts is enabled, it will automatically generate all columns recursively. (all columns on all levels)
description.jp:
if true, will autogenerate all layouts assuming default values for "childrenDataProperty"
    When autoGenerateLayouts is enabled, it will automatically generate all columns recursively. (all columns on all levels)

description.en: Specifies the default tooltip applied to an expand column cell, that is currently expanded
description.jp: Specifies the default tooltip applied to an expand column cell, that is currently expanded

description.en: List of columnLayout objects that specify the structure of the child grids. All options that are applicable to a flat grid are also applicable here
description.jp: List of columnLayout objects that specify the structure of the child grids. All options that are applicable to a flat grid are also applicable here

description.en: Specifies the columnLayout key. This is the property that holds the data records for the current column layout.
description.jp: Specifies the columnLayout key. This is the property that holds the data records for the current column layout.

description.en: Specifies the foreignKey of the columnLayout. This is also the column key of the parent grid.
description.jp: Specifies the foreignKey of the columnLayout. This is also the column key of the parent grid.

description.en: Specifies the property name in the response where children will be located.
description.jp: Specifies the property name in the response where children will be located.

description.en: Specifies the default property in the response where children will be located
description.jp: Specifies the default property in the response where children will be located

description.en: applies a linear animation - either expanding or collapsing depending on the parent row state
description.jp: applies a linear animation - either expanding or collapsing depending on the parent row state

description.en: Specifies the expand column width
description.jp: Specifies the expand column width

description.en: Specifies the default tooltip applied to an expand column cell, that is currently collapsed
description.jp: Specifies the default tooltip applied to an expand column cell, that is currently collapsed

description.en: Only the first level will be data-bound initially. Also serves as "render" depth, meaning that depending on this prop, the grid will
description.jp: Only the first level will be data-bound initially. Also serves as "render" depth, meaning that depending on this prop, the grid will

description.en: No levels will be automatically expanded when the widget is instantiated for the first time
description.jp: No levels will be automatically expanded when the widget is instantiated for the first time

description.en: Specifies the limit on the number of levels to bind to
description.jp: Specifies the limit on the number of levels to bind to

description.en: If true, encodes all requests using OData conventions and the $expand syntax
description.jp: If true, encodes all requests using OData conventions and the $expand syntax

description.en: Specifies the delimiter for constructing paths , for hierarchical lookup of data
description.jp: Specifies the delimiter for constructing paths , for hierarchical lookup of data

description.en:
If true, load on demand will be achieved using REST compliant resource access with appropriate url-s for
    the ajax GET calls.
description.jp:
If true, load on demand will be achieved using REST compliant resource access with appropriate url-s for
    the ajax GET calls.
